Name: Blubbercream
Desc: Aqua-blue ice cream. The best way to while away a sweltering day is by enjoying some refreshing ice cream. It chills the body and cools the soul, giving one a feeling akin to having leaped into the sea, all worries dissipating as the heat flees your mouth, leaving naught but pure joy.
Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 261 and healing effects by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
